Welcome to QLearningGame’s documentation!¶

Plotter

Contains functions that can be used to implement various plots.

This file contains the following functions:

  • train_time - to plot the time taken to train an agent

plots.train_time(times_taken)¶

2D plot: iterations vs. cumulative training time.

Tests

This file contains the following functions:

  • test - to test an agent

tests.test(Game, agent, init=None, weird=False)¶

Tests an agent.

Agents

This file contains agents that are associated with different types of learning algorithms

Contains the following classes:

  • Agent - parent class

  • QAgent - Q-learning agent

  • DeepAgent - deep Q-learning agent

class agents.Agent¶

Parent agent class

get_pos(state)¶

Gets position of car, trophy as int type.

class agents.DeepAgent¶

Deep Q-learning agent

action(state)¶

Returns an action for a given state.

train(state, action, reward, new_state, success)¶

Trains the bot.

class agents.QAgent¶

Q-learning agent

action(state, weird=False)¶

Returns an action for a given state.

train(state, action, reward, new_state, success)¶

Trains the bot.

Games

This file contains the game defintions.

Work in progress. At the moment, this only contains one game.

class games.Game¶

Game class

get_state()¶

Returns current state.

play(action)¶

Updates state, given an action.

set_state(state)¶

Set game state explicitly.

Training

This file contains a function that can be used to train an agent, given a game.

train.train(Game, agent, episodes=1000)¶

Trains given agent to play the given game.
